name: Shiro (SimonCurtis)
description:
Controls:

Tap WASD to move & click a red space to select a level from the opening scene.

Install Instructions:

Download the game, extract the downloaded file, and run the application from the folder that the game extracts to.

Note:

The current build lets you freely select levels in any order. There's no punishment for dying other than being sent back to the level select scene. Thanks for trying it!

Credits:
